mapper.sql: a.office_id AS "office.id", a.vend_name AS "vendName", a.cate_id AS "bizCategoryInfo.id", bci.name as "bizCategoryInfo.name", a.cate_name AS "cateName", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "delFlag", a.card_number AS "cardNumber", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.payee AS "payee", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.remark AS "remarks", o1.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o1 ON o1.id = a.office_id LEFT join biz_category_info bci on bci.id=a.cate_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM biz_vend_info a
a.vend_name LIKE '%'||#{vendName}||'%' '%'+#{vendName}+'%' concat('%',#{vendName},'%')
AND a.cate_name = #{cateName}
AND a.code LIKE '%'||#{code}||'%' '%'+#{code}+'%' concat('%',#{code},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
order by a.update_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_vend_info( office_id, vend_name, cate_id, cate_name, code, status, u_version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, card_number, bank_name, payee, remark ) VALUES ( #{office.id}, #{vendName}, #{bizCategoryInfo.id}, #{cateName}, #{code}, #{delFlag}, #{uVersion}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{cardNumber}, #{bankName}, #{payee}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_vend_info SET vend_name = #{vendName}, cate_id = #{bizCategoryInfo.id}, cate_name = #{cateName}, code = #{code}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, card_number = #{cardNumber}, bank_name = #{bankName}, payee = #{payee}, remark = #{remarks} WHERE office_id = #{office.id}
